name: Hidden Objects - Candy Kingdom
description:
Ready to enter a world of colorful mystery and intrigue? Hidden Objects - Candy Kingdom is a fun seek and find puzzle adventure that's filled with word scenes, picture lists, and fun items you can play with one by one! Solve puzzles across dozens of creative candy scenes by picking out the items that don't belong. Look at the list, tap the screen, solve the puzzle. It's easy to play, hard to master, and fun to explore!

Candy Kingdom is filled with scenes that have items placed where they don't belong. Find these objects as quickly as you can if you want to solve the puzzle! There are three types of hidden item picture puzzles to complete: words lists, silhouettes, and standard picture-based seek and find scenes. The easiest levels include pictures of items to match against the background. Silhouette levels change things up and only show you the outline of the hidden objects, forcing you to guess what you're looking for. And words list levels are the toughest of all, as they only tell you what to find, you have to guess the shape!

Features:
- Play a seek and find game with colorful candy scenes.
- Search each scene for items on your list.
- Find every item on the list to move on to the next area.
- Three different types of stages: item pictures, outlines, and words lists.
- A handy map lets you quickly travel between areas.
- Fun for all ages!

How to Play:
- Look carefully at each screen and try to locate items on the list.
- Tap an item to collect it. Work fast for a better score.
- Use the map to navigate between levels.
- If you're stuck, you can buy hints to help you out.
